scripts.prepare-matic: mustache config/matic.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/matic.json src/utils/constants.template.ts > src/utils/constants.ts
scripts.prepare-bsc: mustache config/bsc.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/bsc.json src/utils/constants.template.ts > src/utils/constants.ts
scripts.deploy-matic: npm run codegen && npm run prepare-matic && graph deploy --studio liquidyhub-analytics---polygon
scripts.deploy-bsc: npm run codegen && npm run prepare-bsc && graph deploy --studio liquidyhub-analytics---bsc
scripts.prepare-base: mustache config/base.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/base.json src/utils/constants.template.ts > src/utils/constants.ts
scripts.deploy-base: npm run codegen && npm run prepare-base && graph deploy --studio liquidyhub-analytics---base
scripts.prepare-fantom: mustache config/fantom.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/fantom.json src/utils/constants.template.ts > src/utils/constants.ts
scripts.deploy-fantom: npm run codegen && npm run prepare-fantom && graph deploy --studio liquidyhub-analytics---fantom
scripts.prepare-blast: mustache config/blast.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/blast.json src/utils/constants.template.ts > src/utils/constants.ts
scripts.deploy-blast: npm run codegen && npm run prepare-blast && graph deploy --studio liquidyhub-analytics---blast
